ABOUT SYNCWIRE

Your Great Choice

Ideal for dwelling, workplace, automotive, or nightstand, Syncwire iPhone charger cable offers on a regular basis comfort and versatility.

Bulletproof and sturdy nylon fiber fabric offers safety, power and flexibility. It has been examined to resist no less than 12,000 cycles of 90 diploma bend, which will be 12x sturdy than unique system cables.

Ensure quick charging velocity as much as 2.4A and secure knowledge switch. The cable is made of top quality tinned copper and energy twine, and coated with particular insulation materials to cut back the danger of quick circuit.

  • Pad Pro 12.9-inch (1st / 2nd Generation)
  • Pad Pro 10.5-inch / iPad Pro 9.7-inch
  • Pod contact fifth / sixth / seventh Generation
  • Pod nano seventh Generation
